  implicit none
  integer :: n, x, ans, i, j
  integer, dimension(0:200000) :: dp
 
  read *, n

  dp = 0  ! Initialize to 0

  do i =0, n-1
    read *, x
    dp(x) = i
  end do

  ans = 0 do i =2, n
    ans = ans + abs( dp(i) - dp(i -1) )
  end do

  print *, ans

end program

PROGRAM codeforces612B
  IMPLICIT NONE
  INTEGER :: n, x, ans, i
  INTEGER, DIMENSION(0:200000) :: dp

  READ(*,*) n

  dp = 0 

  DO i = 0, n-1
    READ(*,*) x
    dp(x) = i
  END DO

  ans = 0
  DO i = 2, n
    ans = ans + ABS( dp(i) - dp(i-1) )

program codeforces612b
  implicit none
  integer :: n, x, ans, i, j
  integer, dimension(0:200000) :: dp
 
  read *, n

  dp = 0  ! Initialize to 0

  do i =0, n-1
    read *, x
    dp(x) = i
  end do

  ans = 0
  do i =2, n
    ans = ans + abs( dp(i) - dp(i -1) )
  end do

  print *, ans

end program

Now, let's write the Fortran code properly.

Adding the needed declarations, the full code would be:

PROGRAM codeforces612B
  IMPLICIT NONE
  INTEGER :: n, x, ans, i
  INTEGER, DIMENSION(0:200000) :: dp

  READ(*,*) n

  dp = 0 

  DO i = 0, n-1
    READ(*,*) x
    dp(x) = i
  END DO

  ans = 0
  DO i = 2, n
    ans = ans + ABS( dp(i) - dp(i-1) )
  END DO

  WRITE(*,*) ans
END PROGRAM codeforces612B
